pages.text: Hamcunin ʙar onhoe, ki az in pes ʙudand, har pajomʙare, ki firistoda sud, guftand: «Codugarest jo devonaest!»
Ojo ʙa in kor jakdigarro vasijat karda ʙudand? Na, xud mardume toƣi (sarkas) ʙudand
Pas az onho rujgardon sav. Kas turo malomat naxohad kard
Andarz (pand) ʙideh, ki andarz mu'minonro manfiat dorad
Cinnu insro faqat va faqat ʙaroi parastisi Xud ofaridaam
Az onho rizqe namexoham va namexoham, ki maro it'om kunand (xuronand)
Xudost ruzidihanda. Va Ust sohiʙi quvvate saxt ustuvor
In sitamkoronro az azoʙ ʙahraest monandi ʙahrae, ki joronason dostand. Pas ʙa sitoʙ cize (azoʙ) az Man naxohand
Voj ʙar kofiron, az on ruz, ki onhoro va'da dodaand
Qasam ʙa kuhi Tur
va qasam ʙa kitoʙi navistasuda
dar safhae kusoda (Qur'on)
va qasam ʙa ʙajtulma'mur
va qasam ʙa in, saqfi ʙarafrosta (osmon)
va qasam ʙa darjoi molomol, (pur)
ki azoʙi Parvardigorat voqe' sudanist
Va onro daf'kunandae nest
Ruze, ki osmon saxt ʙicarxad
va kuhho ʙa sitoʙ ravon savand
pas dar on ruz voj ʙar duruƣʙarorandagon
onon, ki sargarmi kordon ʙotili xudand
Ruze, ki onhoro ʙa qahr ʙa coniʙi cahannam kasand
In ast on otase, ki duruƣas mesumurded
